title: Sexism on Boards (change is needed)
body:
my thread just got removed and i want to know why

the thread was "lf support gf". it got removed when some chick said "omg im a girl and im offended, remove this thread" this would never happen if a guy said that. or if the thread was "lf support BOYfriend", I doubt it would ever be removed

so what are we gonna do about this GD? call me a troll, call me a fu[ck boi, this is literally sexist and needs to stop. we stand for something or we fall for nothing, whose with me?
